title: Circles of learning
creator_credit: Patricia Roy, David W. Johnson, Roger Johnson and University of Minnesota
brief_description: Provides an introduction to co-operative learning strategies in the primary and postprimary school. Shows an across-the-curriculum approach that develops the co-operative learning skills children need to work in small groups. Though set in the US context, it has applicability to the local classroom situation. Suitable for teachers and tertiary level students.
